com.tokelon.toktales.core.content.graphics

Class RGBAColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tokelon.toktales.core.content.graphics.RGBAColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRGBAColor, IRGBAColor.IMutableRGBAColor

    public class RGBAColor
extends Object
implements IRGBAColor.IMutableRGBAColor
    Creating format:
    [#](red)[red](green)[green](blue)[blue][alpha][alpha]
    () = required
    [] = optional

    Examples:
    - #CC2300FF
    - #FFF
    - CCE
    - FF224C
    - BB2A

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RGBAColor createFromCode(String code)
      If the given code contains an alpha value it will be applied, if not 1.0 will be set as default.
      static RGBAColor createFromCode(String code, float defaultAlpha)
      If the given code contains an alpha value it will be applied, if not the given value will be set as default.
      static RGBAColor createFromCodeWithAlpha(String code, float alpha)
      If the given code contains an alpha value, it will be overridden by the given value.

      • createFromCode

        public static RGBAColor createFromCode(String code)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
        If the given code contains an alpha value it will be applied, if not 1.0 will be set as default.
        Parameters:
        code - The hex code with 3 (4) or 6 (8) component values (respective with alpha). Optional hash (#) as first character.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given code could not be parsed.

      • createFromCode

        public static RGBAColor createFromCode(String code,
                                       float defaultAlpha)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
        If the given code contains an alpha value it will be applied, if not the given value will be set as default.
        Parameters:
        code - The hex code with 3 (4) or 6 (8) component values (respective with alpha). Optional hash (#) as first character.
        defaultAlpha - A value in range [0.0, 1.0].
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given code could not be parsed.

      • createFromCodeWithAlpha

        public static RGBAColor createFromCodeWithAlpha(String code,
                                                float alpha)
                                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        If the given code contains an alpha value, it will be overridden by the given value.
        Parameters:
        code - The hex code with 3 (4) or 6 (8) component values (respective with alpha). Optional hash (#) as first character.
        alpha - A value in range [0.0, 1.0].
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given code could not be parsed.
